channel.title: Posts on Toyking10's Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Toyking10's Dev Blog

item.title: Merry Christmas
item.description: Merry Christmas everyone. In the past two weeks I’ve been hard at work relaxing, eating cookies, and doing other Christmas activities. I hope Santa was kind to you all. I do have an update as per my development. I am still not ready to announce anything, but I have been working on some software for the past 2 weeks in my spare time along with another developer. I’m hoping to announce it by February.

item.title: My Goals
item.description: Hello whoever is reading this! This is my first post on my blog ever. Perhaps no one will ever read these posts, but that’s fine! I’m writing these to have a nice public journal of my efforts in game and software development. I won’t announce what I’m making yet, but I’m getting started. I have 1 game and 1 piece of software I’m planning to develop over the coming months.
